title: New: Mausi – M O V E
body:
After our host performed a miraculous (and rather frustrating) twenty four hour time-machine-esque reversal, it’s up to me to replicate and rewrite every post (all four of them) that disappeared.

So, here we go:

After a year out of releasing new music, Newcastle-via-Italy (a la Davide Santon), sugarpop quartet **Mausi** have returned with the bubblegum sweet _M O V E_. With previous single _Sol._ racking up several hundred thousand plays, and being a constant on the Topshop playlists last year, 2013 is the year they prove they’re far more than one hit wonders. Like sneaking sugar cubes from posh cafe, it’s shamelessly addictive and wonderfully enticing. Check it out below.
